runs.comm: Ashwin gets good drift from round the wicket, inside edge onto the pads
little bit of turn and he tucks it to the leg side
quicker delivery and it forces him forward to drive to the off side
slower through the air, rocks back and clips it to deep midwicket
waits for it and and steers it to the off side, thinks of a run
flatter one and he pushes it towards mid-on, good start by Ashwin
gets some late inswing but it drifts towards the body and he works it behind square on the on side
away swing this time and he angles it to Jadeja at point, Jadeja has had a haircut, just to let you know
inswing this time and he works it to midwicket
not convincing, late away swing and it takes the outside edge which beats slip, Rahul dives in vain at third man
Wade struggles with the away swing and he awkwardly pushes it to cover
swings in from middle to off and he shuffles and tucks it to square leg
squeezes it out towards mid-off and he scampers the single, bit of hesitation
Warner wanted to go over the on side but ended up flat-batting it towards mid-off
switch hit! Unbelievable! Takes it from outside the left-handers leg stump, switches his guard completely, and clears deep extra cover, several rows back, 100 meters #Unreal
low full toss outside off and he times this one well and sends it scurrying past point
Ashwin stops at the crease jusgt before delivery, doesn't confuse Warner as he gets on his knee and lofts over the sight-screen

appeal for a run-out, he tucks it towards midwicket and in coming back for the second run scampers to make his ground, the throw was to the bowler, didn't quite gather the ball cleanly, third umpire takes a look
short and he slaps it over cover point, there was some steep bounce there and Wade didn't time it as well as he would have liked
not the most attractive of shots, makes room and carves it over backward point, Jadeja does really well to chase and pull it back
too wide for the left-hander, Wade nearly fell over the crease as he tried chasing that
slashing at everything, wide outside off and he whacks it off the toe of the bat down to third man
India will be relieved to see the back of Warner, he tries to scoop a full delivery over the off side, mistimes it and Raina moves backwards at extra cover and cups the skier
hurries on the back foot with a quick delivery and he steers it wide of point
full delivery on the pads and swinging in, tucked towards fine leg, not the best line to bowl
cuts it hard but he fails to bisect the off side field
cuts with more precision this time, the slower ball and he waits for it and slices it just wide of cover point, three fielders were pretty close to each other
straight on middle and off and he clips it straight to mid-on
a bit slower this time and he knocks it just wide of mid-on
brilliant save by Vinay, the batsman pulls and the ball races towards the square leg rope but Vinay times his dive well and pulls it back
a fraction short and he plays a short-arm pull down to long-on
Birt tries to slice it away and he ends up chopping it down to the off side
tries to steer this one down to third man and he's beaten all ends up
bowls it straight and tucks him up for room, Birt decides to get behind the line and defend, good bowling
excellent timing, Vinay bowls length outside off and Birt lofts crisply through the line, little effort and maximum reward over long-off
comes round the wicket, Birt makes room to a delivery angling inwards and ends up chopping it towards slip
makes room and squeezes a full delivery down to cover
makes room and biffs it on the front foot to Kohli at mid-off
run-out chance! Birt taps it to the off side and sets off, turns back, Dhoni runs forward, gathers and throws but there's no-one at the stumps at the batsman's end
tries to slog sweep a flatter delivery and nearly loses his stumps in the process
makes room and thumps it to deep point
bashes it down the pitch on the slog and just beats Raina, two fielders converge near the straight boundary and Kphli mops up, good fielding
heads up at wide long-on! Looked like he tried the carrom ball, he stays at the crease and swings it rows back
makes room and steers it hard to third man
tries the reverse sweep and he finds backward point
fires it in and he squeezes it back to the bowler
fires it flat on the blockhole and he nearly drags it onto the stumps
fullish on the pads and he squirts it to the leg side
Birt tries to reverse-scoop that down to third man, interesting choice of shot, missed it completely
flatter delivery and he gets a thick outside edge that beats the keeper
tossed up outside off and he carves this down to the deep on the off side,, pretty much flashed at it

Dropped He absolutely whacked that back to the bowler, tried to hammer it over the bowler but there;s blood all over, doesn't look too good I'm afraid because he may have split that webbing and it's how spinning finger. He's getting some medical attention, you have to feel for the bowler, he's off the field, would have taken great reflexes to catch that, it looks like his little finger has taken the damage
goes back and steers it to the off side
skids through and he cuts it very close to the off stumps to the off side, that would have thudded the stumps had he missed
too wide and the batsman has to stretch to slice that in the air past the infield
full toss and he makes room and bashes it to long-off
goes back to a slightly short delivery and thumps it just wide of extra cover, the fielder in the deep mops up
tries to dig out a full delivery and Dhoni is alone in his appeal for a caught behind
makes room and force this one to long-off
low full toss outside the off stump, Birt makes room to try and slice it over the infield on the off side and he ends up spooning it hard to cover, sharp catch
slightly short and he swivels and pulls behind square on the on side
slower through the air and he pushes it through the line to long-off
quicker delivery and Wade gets his front foot forward and smacks it in the air over cover, clean hit
fuller delivery and he drives to cover
quicker delivery and he pushes it back to the bowler
Hussey makes room and slaps it to the off side
slower one and Hussey swings too early, the ball clips the pads
skids through the clips his pads but that would have missed leg
missed stumping down the leg side, Rahul floats it quick and Dhoni fumbles
stays back and chops it just wide of point, Jadeja's rushed as he gathers the ball and throws
skids through and he's trapped at the crease, clips it to the on side, Rahul's making them think twice about stepping down the pitch
pushes a full delivery down to long-on
this is short on middle and leg, Wade was down the track and then adjusted his shot well and ended up pulling to  fine leg
high and rows behind long-on! Tossed up on leg and he stays at the crease and lofts cleanly over the on side, that brings up his fifty as well!
tries the same shot but it's flatter this time, he finds the arc over mid-on and midwicket and finds the gap perfectly
makes room and he chops it just wide of short third man, Sehwag dives
can't call that a chance, Wade smacks a short and wide delivery and Rohit leaps at backward point and gets a finger to it, that was hit too hard
frees his arms and mistimes the shot to long-on
tries to cut squarer but gets an inside edge which beats Dhoni and scorches past the turf
places it wide of midwicket and the batsmen put pressure on the fielder and scamper home for two
sees him coming down the pitch and bowls the slower ball, Hussey ends up adjusting his shot and places it to cover
short and he;s punished for that, Wade swivels and clubs it over deep square leg
comes down the track and he chops it down to deep point
Wade goes for the slog and misses it completely, well bowled as he got the ball to skid through
full outside off and he squirts it to long-off
clean hit! Tossed up outside the off stump and Hussey gets his front foot forward, gets under the bounce and scoops it over long-off
down the leg side, Dhoni fumbled with it but Hussey was safe
gets forward and squeezes it to the on side
comes round the wicket, he stays back and clips it to midwicket
booming drive down the track and nearly cleans up the non-striker, down to long-off
fires it flat and he knocks it down to short fine leg and Sehwag misfields, too late in getting down to stop it
quicker delivery and much flatter, Wade exposes his stumps and is totally cramped for room as he tries to cut, loses his leg stump, end of a blistering knock
gets forward and pushes it hard down to long-on
pushes a flatter delivery down to long-off
bowls it close to the line of the off stump and he opens the face of the bat and steers it down to third man
opens the face and dabs it down to Rahul at third man who's quite square
chips down the track but it's too full for him to loft, ends up dragging it down to long-on, Vinay falls and rolls on the pitch after delivery
makes room and chops it to the off side and Bailey sends Hussey back, the throw was wide of the stumps
moves across his stumps and tries to plough it down to fine leg across the line but it goes straight to Sehwag at short fine leg
length delivery and he makes room and chops it down to deep point
sprays it full and slightly wide from round the wicket, he comes down the track and forces it to mid-off
gives it more air and he clears the front leg and slogs him cleanly against the turn and clears deep midwicket
whams it down to long-off
makes room to delivery wide of the off stump and he slices it wide of point, Ashwin can' cut it off at square third man
quicker delivery, he places it down to short third man
swings across the line and Dhoni whips off  the bails
makes room and squeezes out a yorker length ball to the off side
pulls a slower ball straight to midwicket and he has to hurry, there's a direct hit at the bowler's end by Praveen but the batsman's home
oho! Bailey walks across to try and scoop it over short fine leg but he changes his mind and jabs it to Jadeja on the off side
good delivery, keeps him quiet again by bowling it full outside off, he chops it to deep backward point
swings and gets an inside edge which trickles past the stumps down to short fine leg
5 off that over! The batsman makes room and fails to squeeze out a fast yorker outside off, good comeback by Vinay
slides it just wide of the leg stump and just misses the stumps, swing and a miss
another drop, this was thudded hard back to Rahul's left, stuck his hand out but couldn't hang on
tossed up and Hussey chips down the track and lofts cleanly over long-on
swings it towards wide long-on and Jadeja nearly over-runs it, manages to get his left hand out to stop it
Hussey aims for the big slog but Rahul pushes it flatter and on the stumps, swing and a miss and it hits the timber
another quick and flat delivery and Marsh swings and the ball clips his pads and rolls to the off side
